issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
Eucanet logs the following errors repeatedly when the eucamdrt router is missing but eucart router exists:

{code}
28 10:09:50  INFO | new networking state: updating system
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO | (re)initializing VPCMIDO driver.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO | 
mido API v5.0 at http://127.0.0.1:8080/midonet-api
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     MidoNet objects cached in 71.34 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |             md router not found
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |             eucamdrt-eucamdbr link not found.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     mido_core populated in 3.75 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     vpcs populated in 0.02 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     vpc subnets populated in 0.04 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     security groups populated in 0.02 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  WARN | Unable to populate instance i-ab202dc5: eucamdrt not found.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  WARN | VPC instance population failed to populate resource at idx 3
2017-07-28 10:09:50  WARN | VPC instance population failed to populate resource at idx 4
2017-07-28 10:09:50  WARN | VPC instance i-ab202dc5 population failed to populate resource at idx 14
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     instances populated in 0.07 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     VPCMIDO models populated in 3.97 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO | Checking unconnected objects:
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     checking ports
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     checking chains
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     checking ip-address-groups
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO |     === ok ===
2017-07-28 10:09:50 ERROR | failed to update midonet: check log for details
2017-07-28 10:09:50  INFO | eucanetd system_scrub executed in 76.74 ms.
2017-07-28 10:09:50 ERROR | could not complete VM network update: check above log errors for details
2017-07-28 10:09:50  WARN | main loop complete (78 ms): failures detected sleeping 1 seconds before next poll
{code}

This issue was raised by a user, the original steps to reproduce are not known. One way to reproduce the issue is to manually delete the eucamdrt router and then restart eucanetd:

{code}
# midonet-cli
midonet> list router
router router0 name vr_vpc-6a9f4171_3 state up asn 0
router router1 name vr_vpc-b426f9bf_2 state up asn 0
router router2 name natr_nat-177f3742b64aaafb8_subnet-ef224e02_6 state up infilter chain0 outfilter chain1 asn 0
router router3 name vr_vpc-ddee5dd2_5 state up asn 0
router router4 name eucamdrt state up asn 0
router router5 name natr_nat-4cc3a5d0f32dc5b4c_subnet-7ce8da56_4 state up infilter chain2 outfilter chain3 asn 0
router router6 name eucart state up asn 64808
midonet> delete router router4
midonet> exit
{code}

To fix the issue you can manually delete eucart and restart eucanetd:

{code}
# midonet-cli
midonet> list router
router router0 name vr_vpc-6a9f4171_3 state up asn 0
router router1 name vr_vpc-b426f9bf_2 state up asn 0
router router2 name natr_nat-177f3742b64aaafb8_subnet-ef224e02_6 state up infilter chain0 outfilter chain1 asn 0
router router3 name vr_vpc-ddee5dd2_5 state up asn 0
router router4 name natr_nat-4cc3a5d0f32dc5b4c_subnet-7ce8da56_4 state up infilter chain2 outfilter chain3 asn 0
router router5 name eucart state up asn 64808
midonet> delete router router5
midonet> exit
{code}
fields.summary: eucanetd logs error repeatedly when eucamdrt router missing
